title: Pasta Recipe
instructions: Boil water with salt and olive oil
Add pasta to the boiling water
Cook for 8-10 minutes until tender
Drain and serve with your favorite sauce

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden brown
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 2 minutes
Add tomatoes and spices, cook until the oil separates
Add chicken pieces, cook until no longer pink
Add water, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes until chicken is tender

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a wok and add garlic
Add sliced bell peppers, carrots, and broccoli
Stir-fry on high heat for 5-7 minutes
Add soy sauce and mix well
Serve hot with rice or noodles

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)
Cream butter and sugars together
Add eggs and mix well
Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt
Fold in chocolate chips
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes

title: Banana Shake
instructions: Cut the Banana Into small pieces
Add some ingridents to it
Shake it well
